name: the blood that warms these veins of ours
name_original: the blood that warms these veins of ours
description:
the blood that warms these veins of ours is an interactive LGBTQ+ horror novella exploring themes of inheritance, grief, isolation, loneliness, sacrifice, and friendship. 

It is designed to be read/played in a single sitting, spanning approximately 1.5 -2 hours. Some of your choices matter. Some don't. At least one has the capacity to save someone's life.

Tread cautiously. 

Something isn't right in Ashwood Grove.

CONTENT WARNING:  graphic descriptions of body horror and violence, light/implied self-harm, and some flashing visuals.
